website_summaries.verdict: This option is highly effective at relieving muscle aches. Choose it if you’re committed to the brand or would like to experiment with a smaller quantity first.
pros: Pre-blended with some of the most effective essential oils for muscle soreness
Highly concentrated, undiluted formulation delivers quick pain relief and provides deep muscle penetration
Thoroughly tested for safety and quality
Built-in dropper makes dispensing just the right amount that much easier
cons: Not everyone is a fan of the strong menthol smell

customer_reviews.title: ... but on first use the other day it worked like magic. I had some tightness in my shoulders ...
customer_reviews.text: Will test again tonight but on first use the other day it worked like magic. I had some tightness in my shoulders and a small kink in my neck from traveling. Rubbed this on mixed with some Vitamin E lotion and I felt great the next morning. Update: have used several more times mixed with lotion or coconut oil. This stuff is amazing. Definitely helps release tension and relax the muscles! I really didn't think it would work so well, but I'm a believer now.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: This essential oil worked seconds after applying it to area ...
customer_reviews.text: This essential oil worked seconds after applying it to area with tight muscles. It has a cooling affect and lasted for a few hours. I used it before going to bed, the product suggest you use it every 3-4 hours during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Jackiepoo007

customer_reviews.title: Good for covering up small of alcohol hand sanitizers
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a gallon on 80% alcohol liquid hand sanitizer from a local distillery when the get kind was impossible to find in stores. I love the liquid version in a small pump spray bottle for the ease of use and non sticky and quick drying nature. However, it had no scent added and the small was not particularly pleasant. I had purchased several 2 ounce pump spray bottles to use with the sanitizer and once I added 7 or 8 drops of this oil to each bottle, the menthol scent covered up the alcohol based smell and actually gave it a cool feel. I have no idea if it has any pain relief value, I just like this scent.
customer_reviews.author: D. Conway

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is awesome! I broke my foot multiple times
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome! I broke my foot multiple times. At this point I still always get pain every now again due to just how my foot is now and/or when it rains. I use this stuff and the pain goes away. Its a small bottle but very little is needed, so it lasts a long time. I also like that its all natural stuff. I bought another bottle for my 89 year old grandma for her arthritis, since i know its awesome stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Keeping it natural
customer_reviews.text: Because pills can often effect kidney and liver function it's best to do all you can with other methods first. This does seem to help my knee pain.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja Stewart

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: I used a similar oil years ago and could no longer find it.I use it at night (because it does smell) but to me all these type of things smell.It is no biggie.I just want results,and it does give me that.use it on my neck and shoulders and my wrist sometimes.And the next morning I am good to go.Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Seems like very high quality oil and arrived FAST
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast and seems like high quality oil blend. I'm pretty new to oils, but I've seen the cheap ones and this is nothing like those. It was exactly what I expected. As far as it's ability to remove pain and/or tension, I can't speak to that. I used it mixed into shea butter while massaging the hub's shoulder muscles. Obviously massaging helps the pain so it's hard to tell if the oil made it even more effective than the massage would have been without it.
customer_reviews.author: tara

customer_reviews.title: So I bought my first air diffuser with this blend of oil and a couple other ones and this really does help me to sleep a little
customer_reviews.text: This weekend is my first time buying and using aromatherapy oils. I'm so tired of taking medicines to "try" to help me relax and fall asleep. I'm an insomniac and also suffer with chronic pain, anxiety and panic attacks and also chronic migraines. I am suffering with shingles right now and being really sick onto of that so I was willing to try Anything!!! So I bought my first air diffuser with this blend of oil and a couple other ones and this really does help me to sleep a little better and to relax me a little more and it's smells very very good I would definitely recommend this to anyone! Very good oil and will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Muscle Tightness and Pain Relief
customer_reviews.text: I rub my wife's back and shoulders 3 to 4 times a week with stuff. I apply a thin film of a carrier oil first, then apply a good amount of this next. After a 10 minute rub down, she's fast asleep and feeling good! It seriously deep penetrates the muscles for a soothing relief. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Richie

customer_reviews.title: Great for sore muscles AND the diffuser!
customer_reviews.text: Love the wintergreen scent. I have only used it in a diffuser thus far, but it smells amazing. UPDATE: I've ordered this 4 times now and continue to use it in my diffuser but have also used it for sore muscles. The effect is amazing! It completely numbs my painful muscles, feels great on my skin, and the smell is intoxicatingly good. I only wish I could purchase a bigger bottle. 😁👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Morganational

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised that this formula worked. I have taken many classes with essential oil’s, and sometimes I do like to try other formulas when I’m too lazy to make my own. This works pretty good. I am a massage therapist by trade, I like to apply this to my achy feet and hands.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice blend. I've been searching far and wide for a muscle rub that doesn't have ingredients I dont want and works. I thought, why not make my own? I mixed this with olive oil a ratio of 1 pt oil blend to 3 parts olive oil. I put it in a 10ml roller dispenser. It is easy to apply, but I do have to rub it in well. It feels nice! I like it. I can throw it in my purse too.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine7739

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic oil for pain relief
customer_reviews.text: Best pain killing oil I have found. Releives back, hip and rib pain very fast and lasts for about 10 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Rosgen-Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like using this product on sore muscles and it even helps with muscle cramps!
customer_reviews.author: Weldon  Moore

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell and love that it works quickly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because of pain in my legs and neck. It works awesome. Everyone I lent it to, to try it, were also amazed at the quick relief it gave them. I was so sad when I saw that I was running low on it, that I bought 2 bottles to always make sure I had one on hand. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: CCC

customer_reviews.title: Feels Relieving
customer_reviews.text: The product was used for sore muscle aches and pains. The oil did alleviate the pain however, temporarily. I would recommend this for use. To cut down on the smell and strength of the product, I recommend using a carrier oil.
customer_reviews.author: Alisthegreatest

customer_reviews.title: A natural muscle relaxer
customer_reviews.text: This product works 100% I could literally feel my muscles relaxing as I was applying the oil and rubbing it in to my shoulder. I will most definitely be purchasing this product again! Worth every penny! As an added bonus, the fragrance is very soothing and relaxing which helped me fall asleep faster.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya10312000

customer_reviews.title: Good on aches, good price
customer_reviews.text: This is helpful with my neck and lower back pain. I quickly feel a sensation on my skin and then some relaxation in my muscles. I apply directly to my skin without a carrier oil. I have had no negative affects.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie L. Urich

customer_reviews.title: MUSCLE RELAXANT
customer_reviews.text: THIS PRODUCT IS EASY TO USE. APPLY IT TO SORE MUSCLES AND IT IMMEDIATELY STARS TO WORK. EXCELLENT FOR AFTER WORKOUTS. EXCELLENT VALUE.
customer_reviews.author: EDWARD J.

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: My massage therapist used another manufacturer's blend and I was moved to find my own. This was a much less expensive alternative. It works well, but not as well as my therapists version. Would probably buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Zipper

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff, re-ordered it
customer_reviews.text: This is great, I use it on my bed fo my back in the evening. It smells great too.
customer_reviews.author: chelsea boxwell

customer_reviews.title: Clears up sinuses
customer_reviews.text: I use this in a vaporizer actually to clear my sinuses. The breathe blends usually have an orange oil in them and I'm allergic to citrus, so I shy away. This does really well for seasonal allergies or colds. I run it at night, all night.
customer_reviews.author: Kara A.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I was a skeptic about essential oils. I have a bad back, I’ve worked on my posture and it has since improved. However - I sleep on my back wrong sometimes or pull muscles and this stuff is a life safer, it seriously works.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Yes Yes Yes
customer_reviews.text: I used this oil on my shoulders and it relieved the tension almost immediately. I really like this brand. The Headache Blend in great on headaches and the Spicy Saver Blend stays with me as an immune booster (airports). I sincerely recommend the blends by this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I have just used it 2 days, but it smells great and seems to be helping.

customer_reviews.title: Compare
customer_reviews.text: I tried it to see if it compared to doterra and I found it to be just as good but much affordable.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! I bought it as an alternative for Young ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! I bought it as an alternative for Young Living's Panaway because theirs is just too expensive. It worked just as well! I have a torn ACL and I snow ski. I rub my knee down before I go out and it keeps the swelling and pain down so I can ski.
customer_reviews.author: Poohbear

customer_reviews.title: Is a great product the oil really penetrate to the area that ...
customer_reviews.text: Is a great product the oil really penetrate to the area that causes pain. Is a relief for me. THANK YOU

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality

customer_reviews.title: Massage therapist in a bottle.
customer_reviews.text: Feels good. Smells good. Tastes good? Only my dog could tell you. This product is good, good at doing exactly what it says. My back pain withered away for a time after my wife applied a few drops of this pain numbing, sweet smelling, massage therapist in a bottle.
customer_reviews.author: According To Chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We (me and my wife) have been using Muscle Relief Essential for several years with very good results and we will continue using this for the years to come. Because it does the purpose it’s made for.

I needed to contact the saler to let them know last time I ordered two bottles one had leaked in the package a little less than half the bottle they should have a way to contact the sale like others do

customer_reviews.text: I used this product for knee pain. It immediately takes the pain away and I usually don’t have to use it again for weeks.

customer_reviews.text: This works great for my headaches. It was a great price, came quickly, and I love that it is in a roll-on bottle.

customer_reviews.title: should have saved my money!
customer_reviews.text: I had read in reviews that this product was similar to doTerra Deep Blue, it is not! I applied it to my achy knee 3 times within and hour with little to no effect. It has a pleasant aroma and that is about it. Wishing I would have splurged and bought doTerra!

The oil provides an analgesic response to help alleviate my aches and pain as a result of my workouts. It provides deep muscle relief with its warming effect. I will continue to use muscle relief essential oil after my workouts because it truly helps me .

customer_reviews.title: miracle oil
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product specifically for my father who is on regular pain medication daily for his back and knee pain. He tells me he doesn't want to be on the medication any long so I told him to try this. The first time he used it he called me and asked where I got this "miracle oil"! The oil has allowed him to cut out 1 pill a day. It really has helped and it's great that it's all natural.

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: This really helps with my aches and pain! I've tried doterra's deep blue, and this is very comparable. I also use biofreeze, and I think this works longer.

customer_reviews.text: I use this essential oil quite often and appreciate the relief it gives me for low back pain.

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhh
customer_reviews.text: I wish this worked for me as well as it did for others. I have inflammation in my wrist/thumb due to DeQuervain Syndrome and although this product was applied direct without any added oil it did not work for me. It gave it a cooling/burning sensation but did not do the trick as others have described. Also applied to my girlfriends neck and she broke out in a rash :(
customer_reviews.author: D Capone

customer_reviews.title: Does not work.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would try this and mix with a carrier oil due to price compared to a $35 essential oil that I used. It did not compare but not willing to spend that much on an essential oil. I tried using this for my neck and trapezius pain but it had no effect. I'll stick with Tiger Balm.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Pain Relief Oil
customer_reviews.text: I use essential oils on a regular basis, mainly for muscle pain relief. As we all know, there are some very pricey options available. I chose to try this blend, so that I could compare to the costly version. While not an exact match, it works much in the same manner of the oils I was using for muscle/pain relief, AND at a much lower cost. I would say give this brand a try if you use essential oils often/daily, and if you are tired of paying for a name brand versus paying for a product that works.
customer_reviews.author: christmas shopper

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. Usually I make my own blends of oils, but this one stands alone hands down. I recommended it to a friend, and she has ordered it as well! I put mine in a roller ball bottle and its great for aches and pains, that way I don't have to use my hands. It has an immediate deep cooling sensation, and you can just feel it penetrating into your muscles and gives you such relief. Its a great oil and a great price. I highly recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Holly A. Kazmer

customer_reviews.title: Just the right oil for the job
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it a few times so far, but this oil has been effective in alleviating pain and discomfort from my neck and shoulders, plus hands/fingers that spent too long on the computer keyboard. The oil has the kind of "cool burn" that Icy Hot or other muscle rubs have, but it doesn't have the kind of uncomfortable or painful burn that some essential oils can have. The aroma is also quite pleasant. All in all, this may indeed become my go-to product for aches and pains.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

product_meta.title: Prime Natural Muscle Relief Essential Oil Blend 30ml - Natural Pure Undiluted Therapeutic Grade for Aromatherapy Massage - Relieves Muscle Pain, Spasms, Stiffness, Backache, Sprained Sore Muscle
feature_bullets: RECOVER SORE MUSCLE FAST : Muscle Relief Blend combines powerful analgesic oils which has anti-inflammatory & anti-spasmodic properties that will relieve muscle pain, spasms, stiffness, backache and joint pain. So you can get back to your normal life fast and enjoy.

ENJOY ACTIVE LIFE AND CALMING SMELL : It effects are deep, cool, penetrating and long lasting. It will open up blood vessels close to the skin surface which will increase blood flow and alleviate the minor aches, pain and sore muscles.

Ingredients : Wintergreen, Peppermint, Camphor, Eucalyptus, German Chamomile essential oil. All our oils are Pure, Natural, Undiluted, Non-additives, Non-fillers, Non-synthetics, GMO-free, Best for Aromatherapy & Scents.

Purity Tested / Quality Guaranteed : Each oil is GC/MS tested to ensure quality. Analysis reports are posted on our website or provided upon request. All our Essentials oils are pure, unadulterated, Therapeutic Grade and without any synthetic chemicals.

Size 30ml (1oz) : Packaged in high quality dark amber glass bottle with euro style dropper and tamper proof seal cap. Euro style dropper will allow controlled oil dispensing for easy oil drops for measurement without spilling.
